translations: n.多配偶的人；多配偶论者

phrs.translation: 多配偶论者, 多配偶的人
足病医生和多妻的男人

sentences.sentence: He was arrested as a polygamist when his two wives filed complaints about him.
sentences.translation: 在他的两个妻子对他提出控告之后，他因一夫多妻而遭逮捕。

sentences.sentence: He was a polygamist who had, over the course of his lifetime, four wives and eight children.
sentences.translation: 他是一位多配偶主义者。穷其一生，此人娶了四位妻子，产下八个子女。

sentences.sentence: Since last week, police have interviewed members of the polygamist sect looking for evidence.
sentences.translation: 警方自上周起询问了一夫多妻组织的成员，搜集证据。
